author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

The support structure of HGCal and absorber layers had issues in v10 geometry and this is addressed in this PR. So it will affect D41 workflow

#### PR validation:

Tested with runTheMatrix.py for the workflow 29034.0

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

Aiming for the next pre-release of 10_6_0 (pre5) and MC productions with V10 geometry of HGCal
title: Phase2-hgx193 PhUpdate HGCal geometry for the support structure
